shortdesc.ph: The type of the audio route.

plentry.pd: 0: Audio output routing is a headset with microphone.
1: The audio route is an earpiece.
2: The audio route is a headset without a microphone.
3: The audio route is the speaker that comes with the device.

plentry.props: cpp unreal bp unity ios mac rn electron flutter cs

pd.props: cpp unreal bp unity ios mac rn electron flutter
pd.ph: 4: The audio route is an external speaker.

plentry.pd: 5: The audio route is a Bluetooth device using the HFP protocol.

plentry.props: mac cpp unreal bp unity flutter electron cs

pd.props: mac cpp unreal bp unity flutter electron
pd.ph: 6: The audio route is a USB peripheral device.

ph.props: cpp unreal bp unity flutter electron

plentry.props: mac cpp unreal bp unity flutter electron cs

pd.props: mac cpp unreal bp unity flutter electron
pd.ph: 7: The audio route is an HDMI peripheral device.

ph.props: cpp unreal bp unity flutter electron

plentry.props: mac cpp unreal bp unity flutter electron cs

pd.props: mac cpp unreal bp unity flutter electron
pd.ph: 8: The audio route is a DisplayPort peripheral device.

ph.props: cpp unreal bp unity flutter electron

plentry.props: mac cpp unreal bp unity flutter electron cs

pd.props: mac cpp unreal bp unity flutter electron
pd.ph: 9: The audio route is Apple AirPlay.

ph.props: cpp unreal bp unity flutter electron

plentry.pd: 10: The audio route is a Bluetooth device using the A2DP protocol.
